name: Flight Time Aviation
about: Flight Time Aviation is a comprehensive flight school dedicated to providing high-quality aviation training. Located at a tower-controlled airport, our program is designed to prepare students for multiple FAA certifications and ratings. We offer a fleet of modern aircraft, including Cessna 172s and Piper Archers, as well as advanced flight simulators. Our curriculum includes ground school courses, flight training, and general education to enhance students' intellectual proficiency. With a focus on aviation safety, professionalism, and precision flying, we ensure our graduates are well-equipped for careers as commercial pilots or certified flight instructors. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities make us an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. Join us to embark on a successful aviation career.
